short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds cool features to Salesforce Marketing Cloud interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension replaces standard code editor in Salesforce Marketing Cloud interface with IDE like editor.  At this moment editor is used more than 30k times each month

Features:
1 Code highlighting
2 Syntax error warning
3 Code auto-complete
2 HTML, SSJS and SQL Support

Versions:
3.0.20 Added Share and Heart button.
3.0.10 Added Audience Builder support and Toggle button.
2.4.34 Added GA account, stability improvements 
2.3.74 Performance improvements
2   AMP Script support
1.6 Disabled content editor
1.5 Bug fix for content editor
1.4 Styles improvements
1.3 Fixed bug with inserting code blocks on Email Edit page
1.2 Added word wrapping
1.0 git init
